   "created_at": "2018-05-08T00:40:42Z",
   "github_updated_at": "2020-06-14T09:17:18Z",
   "body_snippet": "Add support for users to write plugins the extend the functionality of mRemoteNG. We will need a simple way to discover, load, and manage plugins within the application.\r\n\r\n## Context\r\n<!--- How has this issue affected you? What are you trying to accomplish? -->\r\n<!--- Providing context helps us come up with a solution that is most useful in the real world -->\r\nThere are several areas where plugin support would be perfect - \r\n- implementing new protocols\r\n- adding support for credential provider...",
-  "our_status": "new",
-  "priority": null,
+  "our_status": "triaged",
+  "priority": "P3-enhancement",
   "target_release": null,
   "our_branch": null,
   "our_pr": null,
-  "iterations": [],
+  "iterations": [
+    {
+      "seq": 1,
+      "date": "2026-02-16",
+      "type": "triaged",
+      "description": "Feature request to enable community extensions and integrations without modifying the core application, a standard feature for connection managers."
+    }
+  ],
   "comments": [
     {
       "id": "MDEyOklzc3VlQ29tbWVudDUwNjgzNDczOA==",
@@ -50,5 +57,5 @@
   "needs_action": true,
   "waiting_for_us": true,
   "last_synced": "2026-02-15T09:52:50Z",
-  "notes": ""
+  "notes": "AI triage (gemini): Feature request to enable community extensions and integrations without modifying the core application, a standard feature for connection managers.\nApproach: Define IPlugin interface in a new shared assembly; implement PluginManager to discover and load DLLs using Reflection/MEF; add UI hooks in FrmMain to expose plugin functionality."
 }
